name: "Praise Jesus-ah!"
reviewBody:
A chubby woman is dropped off at a new church by a guy in a yellow GTO musclecar. Women who cannot say enough good about the minister read her palm and tell her she'll meet a new man. She's led forward to "surrender her life to Jesus-ah!" She has some concern for her son, something that's a feature in the other short by this director, Judgement., which is also featured on the DVD for Psychopathia Sexualis.

The ending of this one is rather obscure to me. Maybe I missed something, or maybe it's up to interpretation.

Shot on digital, the scenes inside the church are filmed somewhat diffusely, lending a different quality to them than the outdoor shots.
